title: Remove global footer from app layout

requirements.summary: Remove the footer from the global AppLayout so no footer content, borders, or spacing appears on any page.
acceptanceCriteria: The <footer> section currently rendered in frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout.tsx is removed (or not rendered) so no footer content appears at the bottom of any route.
After the change, there is no visible bottom border/top border line, footer spacing, or reserved footer area beneath the main content; pages end cleanly at the bottom of their content.
No backend changes are required and no authenticated/unauthenticated navigation behavior is altered.

file_operations.description: Remove (or conditionally do not render) the entire <footer> block, including its border/padding and any layout behaviors that reserve footer space (e.g., mt-auto), ensuring the layout ends after <main> content on all routes.
